metadata.title: CVE-2017-7191 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The netjoin processing in Irssi 1.x before 1.0.2 allows attackers to causea denial of service (use-after-free) and possibly execute arbitrary codevia unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7191` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3').
